title: The 597th role in Grand Idea Mafia.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Select a group of three players. The first player will target the second, while the second WILL TARGET the third. As you can expect, the third will be forced to target the first.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - Immunity to being controlled by outside forces that would alter the effects of the 597th role.
